page.title: 16NORTHDEAN JOINERY.
page.content: HOLT HAS A NEW INDUSTRIAL ESTATE CONTAINING 3 LARGE AND SEVERAL SMALL UNITS. 5 MEN WORK AT NORTHDEAN JOINERY MAKING DOORS, WINDOWS ETC. OUT OF WOOD. THEY USE A CROSS CUT SAW, RIPSAW, PLANER, THICKNESSER, SPINDLE MOULDER,{BIG VACUUM-CLEANER,}MORTICE AND TENON MACHINE, BAND SAW, PANEL SAW, LATHE, COMBINATION MACHINE, AIR COMPRESSOR, SANDER, ROTOR AND DRILLS. THEY MAKE{50 WINDOWS}OR{60 DOORS}A WEEK. THEY SELL WHAT THEY MAKE. PEOPLE VISIT THEIR FACTORY TO GET THINGS. THEY USE FOREIGN TIMBER, GLUE, SCREWS NAILS, SANDPAPER, VARNISH AND PRESERVATIVES. THE FACTORY IS 1 YEAR OLD. THE MEN HAVE 1 LORRY, THE MEN USE THEIR LORRY 2-3 TIMES A DAY. THEY WORK FROM 7.30 TO 5.30 & 7.30 TO 12.30 ON SATURDAY. THEY SELL THEIR THINGS TO {GARDEN CENTRES}AND BUILDERS.
